00056 SO_KIT_SOURCE(TLightKit);
00057 
00058 void TLightKit::initClass()
00059 {
00060         SO_KIT_INIT_CLASS(TLightKit, SoLightKit, "LightKit");
00061 }
00062 
00063 TLightKit::TLightKit()
00064 {
00065         Trace trace( "TLightKit::TLightKit()", false );
00066         SO_KIT_CONSTRUCTOR(TLightKit);  
00067                 
00068         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ENTRY(sunshapelabel, SoLabel, TRUE, this, , TRUE);
00069         SO_KIT_CHANGE_ENTRY_TYPE(icon, TShape, TSquare );
00070         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ABSTRACT_ENTRY(tsunshape, SoNode, TDefaultSunShape, TRUE, this, , TRUE);     
00071 
00072         SO_KIT_INIT_INSTANCE();
00073         
00074         SoDirectionalLight* light = static_cast<SoDirectionalLight*>( getPart( "light", true ) );
00075         light->direction.setValue( SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 ) );
00076         
00077         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
00078         setPart( "transform", transform );
00079 }

00083

00086 bool TLightKit::ChangePosition( QDateTime newTime )
00087 {
00088         Trace trace( "TLightKit::ChangePosition" , false );
00089         m_time = newTime;
00090         
00091         int year = m_time.date().year();
00092         int month = m_time.date().month();
00093         int day = m_time.date().day();
00094         
00095         double hours = m_time.time().hour ();
00096         double minutes = m_time.time().minute ();
00097         double seconds = m_time.time().second ();
00098         cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
00099 
00100         //Localization
00101         double lon = longitude.getValue();
00102         double lat = latitude.getValue();
00103     cLocation myLocation = {lon , lat };
00104     
00105         //Calculate sun position
00106         cSunCoordinates results;
00107         sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00108         
00109         SetSunPosition( results.dAzimuth * tgc::Degree, results.dZenithAngle  * tgc::Degree );
00110         
00111         if ( results.dZenithAngle > 90.0 ) return true;
00112         else return false;
00113 }
00114 
00115 QDateTime TLightKit::GetTime()
00116 {
00117         return  m_time;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void TLightKit::SetSunPosition( double azimuth, double zenith )
00121 {
00122         Trace trace( "TLightKit::SetSunPosition" , false );
00123         
00124         //Trasform calculation
00125     Vector3D direction = Vector3D( sin( zenith ) * sin( azimuth ), cos( zenith ), -sin( zenith )*cos( azimuth ) );
00126         
00127         Point3D center = Point3D( 0, 0, 0 ) + ( direction * 200 );
00128         SbMatrix translate;
00129         translate.setTranslate( SbVec3f( center.x, center.y, center.z ) );
00130         
00131         SbMatrix rotX;
00132         rotX.setRotate( SbRotation( SbVec3f( 1, 0, 0 ), -zenith ) );
00133         
00134         SbMatrix rotY;
00135         rotY.setRotate( SbRotation( SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 ), -azimuth ) );
00136         
00137         SbMatrix coinMatrix = rotX* rotY* translate;
00138         
00139         
00140         SbMatrix inverse = coinMatrix.inverse();
00141         SbVec3f dst;
00142         coinMatrix.multDirMatrix(  SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 ), dst );
00143         
00144         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
00145         transform->setMatrix( coinMatrix );
00146 
00147         //Set the new transfor to light
00148         SoTransform* lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( this->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00149         lightTransform->translation.setValue( transform->translation.getValue() );
00150         lightTransform->rotation.setValue( transform->rotation.getValue() );
00151         lightTransform->scaleFactor.setValue( transform->scaleFactor.getValue() );
00152         lightTransform->scaleOrientation.setValue( transform->scaleOrientation.getValue() );
00153         lightTransform->center.setValue( transform->center.getValue() );
00154         
00155 }
